<!-- auto-generated by sync-docs -->

## Session Status Values

| Status | Icon | Color | ANSI Code | Meaning |
|--------|------|-------|-----------|---------|
| `waiting` | ⏳ | Yellow | 226 | Awaiting user input |
| `permission` | ❓ | Magenta | 201 | Needs tool use approval |
| `working` | ⚙️ | Cyan | 51 | Actively processing |
| `done` | ✅ | Green | 46 | Task completed |
| `idle` | ⏸ | Gray | 245 | Agent is idle |
| `stopped` | ⏹ | Gray | 245 | Session stopped |
| `error` | ❌ | Red | 196 | Error occurred |
| `offline` | ⏹️ | Gray | 245 | Disconnected |
| `unknown` | ○ | Dim | 241 | Unknown or stale status |

## Priority Sorting

Sessions are sorted by attention priority:

1. **waiting** and **permission** — These need user action and sort to the top
2. **Sessions with priority teammates** — Sessions where an agent has waiting/permission status
3. **All other statuses** — Sorted by timestamp (most recent first)

## Color Scheme

| UI Element | Color | ANSI Code |
|------------|-------|-----------|
| Dim text (CWD, messages) | Gray | 241 |
| Selection background | Dark gray | 236 |
| Borders and highlights | Purple | 99 |

## Metric Thresholds

| Level | Token Count | Color |
|-------|-------------|-------|
| Normal | < 100k | Default |
| Warning | 100k - 500k | Yellow |
| Critical | > 500k | Red |

## Token Format

| Value | Display |
|-------|---------|
| 0 | `0` |
| 500 | `500` |
| 1,200 | `1.2k` |
| 45,000 | `45k` |
| 1,500,000 | `1.5M` |

## Duration Format

| Duration | Display |
|----------|---------|
| 45 seconds | `45s` |
| 5 minutes | `5m` |
| 83 minutes | `1h 23m` |
| 2 hours | `2h` |
